dataset_id: Nimbus Temperature-Humidity Infrared Radiometer 11.5 µm Swath L1, HDF5 V001
title: Nimbus Temperature-Humidity Infrared Radiometer 11.5 µm Swath L1, HDF5 V001
summary: This data set (NmTHIR115-1H) consists of daily, global radiative temperatures measured in the 11.5 µm window (10.5 µm - 12.5 µm) by the Temperature-Humidity Infrared Radiometer (THIR) on board the Nimbus 4 satellite. This window was used to measure cloud top or surface temperatures.

This window was used to measure cloud top or surface temperatures.
